overview:
Thomas Glasgow is the founder and current manager of Seton Consulting EURL, a french based company specialized in the design of paper machinery.

During 2008, and seeing the time wasted and money spent on off-site trianing, Thomas decided to launch digiprof.fr, a new web service for delivering on demand distance learning videos in the fields of IT by the use of high resolution screencasts and streaming.

Thomas received a mechanical engineer degree from Ecole Nationale Supérieure d’Arts et Métiers ParisTech, and an MSc from the Georgia Institute of Technology, and was awarded a silver medal for the bright completion of his studies.
